Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via: Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Dvision, due to, street blockage, near Division/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Dvision, due to, street blockage, near Division/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Morse
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Morse due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Morse due to a door problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
